reportfile.name: Alerts Report - Alert Activity
reportfile.description: Show SQL compliance manager alert activity.

reportfile.name: Application Audit Report - Application Activity
reportfile.description: List all activity by application.

reportfile.name: Database Object Audit Report - Backup and DBCC Activity
reportfile.description: List all backup, restore and DBCC activity.

reportfile.name: Database Object Audit Report - Backup and DBCC Activity (last N days)
reportfile.description: List all backup, restore and DBCC activity for last N days.

reportfile.name: Database Object Audit Report - Object Activity
reportfile.description: List all activity for specified objects.

reportfile.name: DDL Audit Report - Database Schema Change History
reportfile.description: List all schema changes made to specified databases.

reportfile.name: DDL Audit Report - Database Schema Change History (last N days)
reportfile.description: List all schema changes made to specified databases in last N days.

reportfile.name: Host Audit Report - Host Activity
reportfile.description: List all activity for specified hosts.

reportfile.name: Policy Audit Report - Agent History
reportfile.description: List all activity for SQL compliance manager Agent.

reportfile.name: Policy Audit Report - Audit Control Changes
reportfile.description: List all changes to SQL compliance manager audit settings.

reportfile.name: Policy Audit Report - Integrity Check
reportfile.description: List all integrity check violations.

reportfile.name: Security Audit Report - Change History (by object) (last N days)
reportfile.description: List security changes for specified objects in last N days.

reportfile.name: Security Audit Report - Change History (by object)
reportfile.description: List security changes for specified objects.

reportfile.name: Security Audit Report - Change History (by user)
reportfile.description: List security changes performed by specified users.

reportfile.name: Security Audit Report - Permission Denied Activity
reportfile.description: Lists all activity for which permission was denied.

reportfile.name: Security Audit Report - User Login History
reportfile.description: List all login activity for specified users.

reportfile.name: User Audit Report - Login Creation History
reportfile.description: List all login creation activity.

reportfile.name: User Audit Report - Login Creation History (last N days)
reportfile.description: List all login creation activity in last N days.

reportfile.name: User Audit Report - Login Deletion History
reportfile.description: List all login deletion activity.

reportfile.name: User Audit Report - Login Deletion History (last N days)
reportfile.description: List all login deletion activity in last N days.

reportfile.name: User Audit Report - User Activity History
reportfile.description: List all activity for specified users.

reportfile.name: User Audit Report - Server Login Activity Summary
reportfile.description: Lists login statistics per server with per login details.

reportfile.name: Policy Audit Report - Alert Rules
reportfile.description: List alert rules.

reportfile.name: Application Audit Report - Application Activity Statistics
reportfile.description: List a summary of application activity by activity type.

reportfile.name: Audit Report - Daily Audit Activity Statistics
reportfile.description: Provides summary audit statistics per day.
